description:
Hi,

Hope you are doing good…!!

I am Baiju represented to Applab Systems, and I have an excellent job opportunity for you. Please find the below job description and if you are comfortable, please reply or contact me for further discussion.

Job Title: Logistic Coordinator (Control Tower Group)

Location: Santa Ana, CA 92707 (Onsite)

Job Type: 12+ Months

Job Description

We are seeking motivated and detail-oriented Logistic Coordinators to join our Control Tower Group in Santa Ana, CA. This role is pivotal in ensuring efficient and cost-effective transportation and logistics solutions. The ideal candidates will have a strong background in route optimization, multimodal transport, and logistics process management.

Responsibilities

* Identify various risks that may arise during contract execution or business operations and establish alternatives to mitigate them.
* Resolve logistical issues by maintaining close relationships with shipping companies and execution partners (rail companies, trucking/drayage companies, port terminals) to secure favourable transportation resources and rates.
* Monitor delivery progress from ocean shipping vessels to final delivery destinations.
* Develop simple tools to manage regular shipment monitoring and report status to upper management, customers, and headquarters.
* Analyze data to identify pending issues affecting seamless movement and collaborate with related parties to resolve these issues.
* Analyze and report monthly Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for drayage deliveries.
* Create and share delivery status reports with customers.
* Develop innovative plans to reduce logistics costs and optimize client operations.
* Identify and establish solutions for operational issues in various regions and bases.
* Establish communication channels and regular meeting sessions with carriers, customers, and internal departments.
* Perform ad-hoc reporting and other job-related duties as required.

Requirements/Qualifications

* Bachelor's degree preferred, or GED equivalent.
* Experience in route setup and optimization for various transport modes, including multimodal transport.
* Proven ability to establish and manage logistics processes, including warehouse operations and local transportation.
* Strong team player with a positive attitude.
* Proficient in Outlook, MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word), with advanced skills in vlookup and pivot tables.
* Excellent prioritization skills, with the ability to shift focus to urgent issues without falling behind on other duties.

Preferred Attributes

* Background in logistics and transportation management.
* Effective communication skills with a diverse range of stakeholders.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

--

Thanks & Regards,

Baiju Kumar

baiju@applabsystems.com

+1 732-847-2074

4365 Route 1 South, Suite 105, Princeton, NJ-08540
